direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods deal with setting and retrieving the charset of the document.
Both methods involve updating the state of the document's charset-related elements.
Both methods ensure the presence of charset-related elements in the document.

enhanced_by.reason: The state of the meta charset element needs to be updated before setting the charset.
The output settings need to be updated when changing the charset.
The charset method should be used to verify the charset after setting it.
